message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR 

The paper is about person re-identification, which is a computer vision task. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a novel loss function based on deep metric learning, which involves optimizing the feature embedding using machine learning techniques. This suggests that cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on three benchmarks, which indicates that cs.MM (Multimedia) could also be a relevant sub-category. The paper also involves optimizing the similarity function between probe and gallery images, which suggests that cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) could be another relevant sub-category. Finally, the paper proposes a new loss function to improve clustering, which could be relevant to cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
